member.summary: A controller demonstrating the way logging can be done but IT SHOULD NOT BE DONE.

member.summary: The logger to be used.

member.summary: Our in memory data collection (for the sake of simpleness).

member.name: P:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.NextId
member.summary: A helper giving us the next id to use.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller})
member.summary: Constructs a new instance.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.GetModelList
member.summary: Gets the list of all models.
member.response: OK: returned when the operation was success and retuns the list of all models.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.GetModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the model with the given id.
member.param: The id of the model to be returned.
member.response: OK: returned when the operation was success and returns the model with the given id.
Bad Request: returned when the client sent invalid data.
Not Found: returned when no model with the given id exists.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.PostModel(DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Models.Scenario0RequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new model.
member.param: The request holding the values to be created.
member.response: Created: returned when the operation was success and returns the created model.
Bad Request: returned when the client sent invalid data.
Not Found: returned when no model with the given id exists.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.PutModel(System.Int32,DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Models.Scenario0RequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the model with the given id setting it to the values from the request.
member.param: The id of the model to be updated.
The request holding the new values.
member.response: OK: returned when the operation was success and returns the model with the updated values.
Bad Request: returned when the client sent invalid data.
Not Found: returned when no model with the given id exists.

member.name: M:DotNetCoreLoggingDemoAPI.Scenario0.Controllers.Scenario0Controller.DeleteModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the model with the given id.
member.param: The id of the model to be deleted.
member.response: No Content: returned when the operation was success.
Bad Request: returned when the client sent invalid data.
Not Found: returned when no model with the given id exists.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.SwashbuckleIntegration
member.summary: Extension methods for integrating Swashbuckle.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.SwashbuckleIntegration.AddSwashbuckle(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the Swashbuckle related services (add Swashbuckle after MVC).
member.param: The service collection to be extended.
